verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w*: See \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H8104"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w its|strong="H8104"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w offerings|strong="H7133"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* fire, \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing \w aroma|strong="H7381"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* tell \w them|strong="H7126"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w made|strong="H8141"\w* \w by|strong="H8141"\w* fire \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w regular|strong="H8548"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w* year-old \w male|strong="H3532"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*.

\w Offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H3532"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w twilight|strong="H6153"\w*,\f + \fr 28:4 \ft Hebrew between the two evenings; also in verse 8\f*

along \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w an|strong="H4503"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \f + \fr 28:5 \ft A tenth of an ephah is approximately 2 dry quarts or 2.2 liters (probably about 2.6 pounds or 1.2 kilograms of flour); also in verses 13, 21, and 29.\f* \w as|strong="H5560"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w quarter|strong="H7243"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w of|strong="H1969"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w from|strong="H8081"\w* pressed olives.\f + \fr 28:5 \ft Or a quarter hin of pure olive oil; Hebrew a quarter hin of pressed oil; that is, approximately 0.97 quarts or 0.92 liters; similarly in verses 7 and 14\f*

\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w regular|strong="H8548"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w established|strong="H6213"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing \w aroma|strong="H7381"\w*, \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* accompanying \w each|strong="H3532"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w quarter|strong="H7243"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w*. \w Pour|strong="H5258"\w* \w out|strong="H5258"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H5262"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fermented \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* area.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w twilight|strong="H6153"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* same grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*. \w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing \w aroma|strong="H7381"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. The Sabbath Offerings

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w present|strong="H4503"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w* year-old \w male|strong="H3532"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, accompanied \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w two-tenths|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H8141"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \f + \fr 28:9 \ft Two-tenths of an ephah is approximately 4 dry quarts or 4.4 liters (probably about 5.1 pounds or 2.3 kilograms of flour); also in verses 12, 20, and 28.\f* \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* well \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*.

This \w is|strong="H5930"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H8548"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w addition|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w regular|strong="H8548"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H5930"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*. The Monthly Offerings

\w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w you|strong="H7126"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H3532"\w* ram, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w male|strong="H3532"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w*,

along \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w three-tenths|strong="H7969"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w an|strong="H4503"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \f + \fr 28:12 \ft Three-tenths of an ephah is approximately 6 dry quarts or 6.6 liters (probably about 7.6 pounds or 3.5 kilograms of flour); also in verses 20 and 28.\f* \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w as|strong="H5560"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two-tenths|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w an|strong="H4503"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w as|strong="H5560"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* ram,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w each|strong="H3532"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*. \w This|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing \w aroma|strong="H7381"\w*, \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H1961"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w shall|strong="H8141"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \f + \fr 28:14 \ft Half a hin is approximately 1.9 quarts or 1.8 liters of wine.\f* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w each|strong="H3532"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \f + \fr 28:14 \ft A third of a hin is approximately 1.3 quarts or 1.2 liters of wine.\f* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* ram, \w and|strong="H6499"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w quarter|strong="H7243"\w* \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w each|strong="H3532"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w monthly|strong="H2320"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H2320"\w* \w each|strong="H3532"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* \w moon|strong="H2320"\w* \w throughout|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w addition|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w regular|strong="H8548"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w male|strong="H8163"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w presented|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*. Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread (Exodus 12:14–28; Leviticus 23:4–8; Deuteronomy 16:1–8)

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w*; \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* eaten.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w assembly|strong="H4744"\w*; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w regular|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

\w Present|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H8141"\w* fire, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H3532"\w* ram, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w male|strong="H3532"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w unblemished|strong="H8549"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w shall|strong="H6213"\w* consist \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* \w three-tenths|strong="H7969"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* ephah \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w*, \w two-tenths|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* ephah \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ram,

\w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6241"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* ephah \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w each|strong="H3532"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*.

\w Include|strong="H5921"\w* one \w male|strong="H8163"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w as|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H3722"\w* \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w present|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* addition \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w regular|strong="H8548"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w hold|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w assembly|strong="H4744"\w*; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w regular|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*. The Feast of Weeks (Deuteronomy 16:9–12)

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w grain|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Feast \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Weeks|strong="H7620"\w*,\f + \fr 28:26 \ft That is, Shavuot, the late spring feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; it is also known as the Feast of Harvest (see Exodus 23:16) or the Feast of Pentecost (see Acts 2:1).\f* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w assembly|strong="H4744"\w*; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w regular|strong="H5656"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

\w Present|strong="H7126"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w*, \w one|strong="H3532"\w* ram, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w male|strong="H3532"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing \w aroma|strong="H7381"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,
